description.description:
Clear, concise description of what this command does in 5-10 words, in active voice. Examples:
Input: ls
Output: List files in current directory

Input: git status
Output: Show working tree status

Input: npm install
Output: Install package dependencies

Input: mkdir foo
Output: Create directory 'foo'

run_in_background.description: Set to true to run this command in the background. Use BashOutput to read the output later.
